response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This unique item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,200,000 to you. We are offering this exceptional piece to you at a special price of $1,350,000, aiming to bridge the gap between our valuation and yours while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. Should you find this proposal appealing, please let us know, and we can proceed with the details of the purchase. If you need any further information or have questions about the product, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1350000}
